programme.title: Saint Ralph
Święty Ralph
Saint Ralph
programme.desc:
Saint Ralph: Directed by Michael McGowan. With Adam Butcher, Michael Kanevsky, Gordon Pinsent, Tamara Hope. Saint Ralph is the unlikely story of Ralph Walker, a ninth grader who outran everyone's expectations except his own in his bold quest of trying to win the 1954 Boston Marathon." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0384488/","name":"Saint Ralph","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzkzODM3NDk3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDQ2NzA3._V1_.jpg","description":"Saint Ralph is the unlikely story of Ralph Walker, a ninth grader who outran everyone's expectations except his own in his bold quest of trying to win the 1954 Boston Marathon.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0384488/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SpaceComics"},"dateCreated":"2005-08-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Athletic determination of a spirited boy against a backdrop of pathos.","reviewBody":"Clearly the best movie out this month (July/August 2005 - I've seen most of them). The easiest way to tell you about it is to compare it to similar movies, and the first that came to mind were Lucas (Corey Haim) and Rudy (Sean Astin). What Saint Ralph shares in common with these films is the extreme athletic determination, against all odds, of a spirited boy from a pathetic background. And it's the best of it's kind since Rudy (1993), at least, and in my opinion since Lucas (1986).

Ralph (Adam Butcher) is a naughty but naive 14-year-old boy, ready to take almost everything literally, now faced with the paradox of faith. His widowed mother is apparently dying in the hospital, and falls into a coma early in the story. A doctor says it will take a miracle to wake her.

Ralph is an interesting character, his even blend of pure and impure motives providing both the humor that make the film entertaining, and the realism that make it believable. His self-abuse in every sense defines the term, from the usual meaning to literally sanding his knees to pray in a pan of alcohol, the latter recommended by his girlfriend, who aspires to be a nun.

When his Catholic school's cross country coach says it would be a miracle if anyone on his team won the Boston Marathon, Ralph's literal mind seizes a fallacious opportunity. If he wins the Boston Marathon, it would be a miracle, and that's what his mother needs to survive. Most of the movie is about his training to run that race, both physical and spiritual, with the help of a priest (Campbell Scott), a nurse (Jennifer Tilly), and his girlfriend (Tamara Hope).

The blend of comedy and pathos is effective, the film kept entertaining by the comedy in the foreground, while the fact that Ralph's mother is dying keeps us interested in the outcome and rooting for the boy. Even if you don't like running or sports in general, the life at stake, or at least the boy's faith at stake, makes this race important.

There may be a bit too much sexual comedy for most parents to let small children see. For instance, after Ralph's caught in a venal sin in the swimming pool, that involved spying on the girl's locker room, he tells his mother "It was really an accident. The manufacture of the pool was faulty." The incident becomes a running joke, demonstrating Ralph's character trait of not caring what other people think. He later says they didn't really need to drain the pool (I'm not going to explain that, you've got to see it, but it was funny). But it's not as crude as other current comedies like The Wedding Crashers and The Bad News Bears.

I recommend Saint Ralph specifically to anyone who liked Lucas or Rudy, and generally to anyone old enough to take the humor maturely.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6018,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"2005-04-08","keywords":"doubt,male protagonist,year 1954,character name as title,nickname as title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Saint Ralph","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1619329305","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDYwNGEzNWYtNjlhMy00ZGRmLThiYTYtZjk0YzYzMmU2YzU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDYwNGEzNWYtNjlhMy00ZGRmLThiYTYtZjk0YzYzMmU2YzU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Samuel Goldwyn"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124666/","name":"Adam Butcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001714/","name":"Campbell Scott"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000236/","name":"Jennifer Tilly"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1313340/","name":"Michael McGowan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0072477/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0297908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1313340/","name":"Michael McGowan"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: When Billie Beat Bobby
Kiedy Billie pokonała Bobby'ego
When Billie Beat Bobby
programme.desc: When Billie Beat Bobby: Directed by Jane Anderson. With Holly Hunter, Ron Silver, Matt Letscher, Bob Gunton. programme.title: A Kind of Murder
Sposób na morderstwo
A Kind of Murder
programme.desc:
A Kind of Murder: Directed by Andy Goddard. With Patrick Wilson, Jessica Biel, Haley Bennett, Eddie Marsan. In 1960s New York, Walter Stackhouse is a successful architect married to the beautiful Clara who leads a seemingly perfect life. But his fascination with an unsolved murder leads him into a spiral of chaos as he is forced to play cat-and-mouse with a clever killer and an overambitious detective, while at the same time lusting after another woman." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2726552/","name":"A Kind of Murder","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwNDA1NjcwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY0MDA2MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1960s New York, Walter Stackhouse is a successful architect married to the beautiful Clara who leads a seemingly perfect life. But his fascination with an unsolved murder leads him into a spiral of chaos as he is forced to play ca","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2726552/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"randymcbeast"},"dateCreated":"2016-12-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hints of De Palma but then the story ends up going nowhere","reviewBody":"This was a beautifully shot film and at points I thought I was watching a Brian De Palma film, but all of that went out south in the last ten minutes.

The story had built up nicely and I was salivating at the prospect of a wild twist of an ending. The cast and the acting were all top notch and it held up nicely as the period piece it intended to be, but then things started going haywire and it all just fell apart.

It really seemed as if the movie perhaps ran out of money in the budget and then they just slapped together some incoherent garbage and called it a day. There has to be some explanation. I mean, the first hour plus of the movie was really well done so what the heck happened? It's a shame too because with the right editing it could have been great.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7407,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2016-12-16","keywords":"movie theater,corvette,poodle,cocktail party,death of wife","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Kind of Murder","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1088141849","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2NzI2ZWUtMzU4NS00NDg2LTk3NGQtMGZlZTAzNzI5YzEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2NzI2ZWUtMzU4NS00NDg2LTk3NGQtMGZlZTAzNzI5YzEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for A Kind of Murder"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933940/","name":"Patrick Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004754/","name":"Jessica Biel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2247245/","name":"Haley Bennett"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323758/","name":"Andy Goddard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030755/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5608704/","name":"Susan Boyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383604/","name":"Patricia Highsmith"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Killer Bees
Mordercze pszczoły
Killer Bees!
programme.desc:
Killer Bees: Directed by Penelope Buitenhuis. With C. Thomas Howell, Tracy Nelson, Fiona Loewi, Noel Fisher. After a truck accident causes their release, a small rural town is faced with a swarm of killer bees." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0353625/","name":"Killer Bees","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU5OTU2NzAtNTA5Ny00MTc3LTlkOGMtNjIxMzVmOTA0MTlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjIzMTQ5NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After a truck accident causes their release, a small rural town is faced with a swarm of killer bees.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0353625/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Prismark10"},"dateCreated":"2015-08-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Honey I'm Home","reviewBody":"Killer Bees is a stinging remake of Jaws even going as far as having a town mayor warning the sheriff not to frighten the locals.

C Thomas Howell is the sheriff in question and he has thing against bees as he saw his father die from an attack by a swarm of bees as a child.

After a truck driven by what seems like a drunk driver from South America is involved in an accident, a crate or two filled with South American killer bees are unleashed.

The Sheriff is suspicious as one or two bodies turn up dead with what looks like bee stings. He calls in a bee expert, she happens to have the hots for our sheriff. Fortunately although the sheriff is married with kids, he is available as it seems that he and his wife are not together any more.

Of course the nasty Mayor who spends his time buying up land from poor farmers will have none of these deadly bee tales. He is organising the Honey Festival and everyone is going to show up for that including the local media. I think the Mayor failed to tell the bees not to show up as that leads to the stinging finale.

There is no suspense here as initially a few stray people get attacked and killed before a member of the sheriff's family is under attack. The CGI bees are poor but the whole movie is still a lot better than an Asylum film made for the Sci-Fi channel.

Its corny, its predictable but its also cheesy fun.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":872,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-11-19","keywords":"psychotronic film,creature feature,bee,killer bee,bee attack","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001367/","name":"C. Thomas Howell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0625796/","name":"Tracy Nelson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0517370/","name":"Fiona Loewi"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0119689/","name":"Penelope Buitenhuis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074385/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086887/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045895/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2091795/","name":"Dana Stone"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Wataha: With Leszek Lichota, Aleksandra Poplawska, Andrzej Zielinski, Maciej Mikolajczyk. After bombing attack, which killed his friends from the Border Guard, Captain Wiktor Rebrow trying to unravel the mystery and figure out what happened and who is behind it all." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4048942/","name":"Wataha","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzY1ZGFjODYtODAyMS00YzUwLTlkZGItNTM3YmY4MDlmMTkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After bombing attack, which killed his friends from the Border Guard, Captain Wiktor Rebrow trying to unravel the mystery and figure out what happened and who is behind it all.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4048942/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nonsensefans"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Gripping and Heartbreaking Thriller Drama !!","reviewBody":"I loves watching foreign series, but how come I just found this amazing series now ? More people needs to watch this show, it's a Polish thriller and it's as good as Dark.. The cast are great especially the main actor Leszek Lichota who plays Wiktor Rebrow. All 3 seasons are very gripping and thrilling, you won't be bored..It was heartbreaking sometimes, how come every person around him died ? I'm writing cause I saw very few review and this show deserves a good watch..I really enjoyed it and hopes for more seasons to come.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2486,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-10-12","keywords":"polish military,camouflage uniform,firearm,paramilitary,border guards","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2643206/","name":"Leszek Lichota"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1728821/","name":"Aleksandra Poplawska"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956190/","name":"Andrzej Zielinski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0141575/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113668/"}]}</script><metacontent="

All 3 seasons are very gripping and thrilling, you won't be bored..It was heartbreaking sometimes, how come every person around him died ? programme.title: Dracula 2000
Dracula 2000
programme.desc: Dracula 2000: Directed by Patrick Lussier. With Gerard Butler, Christopher Plummer, Jonny Lee Miller, Justine Waddell. A group of thieves breaks into a chamber expecting to find paintings, but instead they release the count himself, who travels to New Orleans to find his nemesis' daughter, Mary Van Helsing." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0219653/","name":"Dracula 2000","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzUxYzFlZjYtYWNiOC00ZmY0LThjMjYtMDdlNmRhNmY5MDRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of thieves breaks into a chamber expecting to find paintings, but instead they release the count himself, who travels to New Orleans to find his nemesis' daughter, Mary Van Helsing.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0219653/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hokeybutt"},"dateCreated":"2005-02-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Uh, Wes Craven Did *What* On This Movie?","reviewBody":"Dracula 2000 (3 outta 5 stars) I didn't expect much from this movie... so I guess that's why I ended up enjoying it as much as I did. There are some interesting interpretations of the vampire myth as it relates to Christianity (not to give anything away)... explaining vampires' aversion to crosses and silver, among other things. The story is kind of all over the place... Dracula is resurrected in the year 2000 by a band of wayward thieves who mistakenly believe that the mysterious Dr. Van Helsing (Christopher Plummer) is hiding something really valuable in that hidden, underground vault. Van Helsing's estranged daughter is simultaneously having weird visions... her father has tried to keep her free from the family legacy for years... but you know IL' Dracula isn't going to let that go on. I could have done without a lot of the wise-ass one-liners from the heroic leading man (Jonny Lee Miller)... it tends to cheapen the whole story and dilute the tension. Still, the movie is a lot better than other recent vampire flicks. I was a bit suspicious of the "Wes Craven Presents" that they tacked onto the title in a desperate ploy to attract an audience... but I think the movie is actually a lot better than 80% of the movies that Craven actually *does* direct. (I'm not much of a fan as you can probably guess.) Good flick... I'm not too sure I want to rush out and see the straight-to-video sequels though."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33236,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Fantasy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2000-12-22","keywords":"van helsing,lucy westenra character,van helsing character,dr jack seward character,first part","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Dracula 2000","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3773734425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGI0M2EwNzAtZGFlYS00M2EyLWEyYmQtNDA3MjI2NjFmMzJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGI0M2EwNzAtZGFlYS00M2EyLWEyYmQtNDA3MjI2NjFmMzJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905311/","name":"Justine Waddell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001538/","name":"Jonny Lee Miller"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527261/","name":"Patrick Lussier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038165/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009681/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0812373/","name":"Joel Soisson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527261/","name":"Patrick Lussier"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Darkness Falls
Gdy zapada zmrok
Darkness Falls
programme.desc:
Darkness Falls: Directed by Jonathan Liebesman. With Chaney Kley, Emma Caulfield Ford, Lee Cormie, Grant Piro. A vengeful spirit has taken the form of the Tooth Fairy to exact vengeance on the town that lynched her 150 years earlier. Her only opposition is the only child, now grown up, who has survived her before." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0282209/","name":"Darkness Falls","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjcwOGM4ZDUtOGFiZS00YTAxLWExMTQtMWQ1NGU2NTZjYjg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A vengeful spirit has taken the form of the Tooth Fairy to exact vengeance on the town that lynched her 150 years earlier. Her only opposition is the only child, now grown up, who has survived her before.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0282209/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LessThanPaddy"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Severe nightmares once upon a time...","reviewBody":"Okay, I admit this may not be a great movie, but I don't think it is the worst either. However, I do think I'm only saying that because I loved it as a kid. Honestly, it was always the choice of scary film for me and my friends at sleepovers etc. It was scary, the tooth-fairy character is my idea of a worst nightmare, and believe me she gave me plenty in the years that followed. I haven't seen it in a few years and while it may not haunt me anymore I suspect it would give me an intermediate shiver if I watched it again today.

Usually I bash films like this. There are probably better horror films out there that I've given worse reviews too, but this one holds sentimental value for me and I genuinely believe that it's not THAT bad. The acting isn't wonderful and the story plays out a bit predictably... I still quite like the premise though and the legend behind Matilda the tooth-fairy.

If you scare easily, I wouldn't recommend you watch this alone. The movie might not be top, but it is full of jumps and the villain is horrifying. Enjoy (with the lights on).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":31282,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Fantasy","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2003-05-21","keywords":"tooth fairy,darkness,night terrors,fear of the dark,supernatural horror","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Darkness Falls","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3634364697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTc0YTA0YzEtZTcyMS00YmI2LTkyZDEtNzg0MWYxZmUyZmJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTc0YTA0YzEtZTcyMS00YmI2LTkyZDEtNzg0MWYxZmUyZmJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Sony Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1015096/","name":"Chaney Kley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0146536/","name":"Emma Caulfield Ford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1112328/","name":"Antony Burrows"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0509448/","name":"Jonathan Liebesman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000532/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022564/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0364899/","name":"Joe Harris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004591/","name":"John Fasano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0888743/","name":"James Vanderbilt"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 11 Blocks
11 Blocks
programme.desc: 11 Blocks: Directed by Matthew Bennett, Sasha Moric. With Craig Henry, Bo Martynowska, Nick Smyth, Bart Badzioch. John 'Concrete' Hong has one night to fight his way across a violent city and rescue the one he loves. After eviction from their apartment, John and Bethany Hong are forced to live on the streets of Union, a violent city where street gangs control the lower blocks. When John journeys to the bottom of the city to find work, the WCC gang corners him. After fighting his way out, he becomes the target of the corrupt Police Chief and his hired assassin, Finger." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2236358/","name":"11 Blocks","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA2OTg3MTQzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDg1NDE3MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"John 'Concrete' Hong has one night to fight his way across a violent city and rescue the one he loves. After eviction from their apartment, John and Bethany Hong are forced to live on the streets of Union, a violent city where street","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2236358/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"resqazalea"},"dateCreated":"2016-10-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting and intriguing","reviewBody":"This film though low to no budget is interesting to watch and a bit realistic. It involves martial arts trained man battling several gangs as he travels many city blocks to save his sister from a hired assassin.Does he succeed? Watch and see. The ending may surprise you as will the over all plot. Though low budget the fact that a lot of the things in this movie goes along with today's world is no coincidence i do believe. Many of the things portrayed in this film show how some of our people and children are living or having to live and it is a shame that in a country as great as ours these things exist. Maybe we need to view this film as a wake up warning and correct some of our societies problems. Watch. Enjoy. After fighting his way out, he becomes the target of the corrupt Police Chief and his hired assassin, Finger." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2236358/","name":"11 Blocks","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA2OTg3MTQzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDg1NDE3MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"John 'Concrete' Hong has one night to fight his way across a violent city and rescue the one he loves. After eviction from their apartment, John and Bethany Hong are forced to live on the streets of Union, a violent city where street","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2236358/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"resqazalea","dateCreated":"2016-10-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting and intriguing","reviewBody":"This film though low to no budget is interesting to watch and a bit realistic. It involves martial arts trained man battling several gangs as he travels many city blocks to save his sister from a hired assassin.Does he succeed? Watch and see. The ending may surprise you as will the over all plot. Though low budget the fact that a lot of the things in this movie goes along with today's world is no coincidence i do believe. Many of the things portrayed in this film show how some of our people and children are living or having to live and it is a shame that in a country as great as ours these things exist. Maybe we need to view this film as a wake up warning and correct some of our societies problems. Watch. Enjoy. programme.title: The Girl
Ziemia jałowa
The Rise
programme.desc: The Girl: Directed by Julian Jarrold. With Sienna Miller, Toby Jones, Imelda Staunton, Conrad Kemp. The turbulent relationship between filmmaker Sir Alfred Hitchcock (Toby Jones) and actress Tippi Hedren (Sienna Miller)." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2132485/","name":"The Girl","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTc0NzA4MDU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTE2Mzg1OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The turbulent relationship between filmmaker Sir Alfred Hitchcock (Toby Jones) and actress Tippi Hedren (Sienna Miller).","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2132485/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Cinetech"},"dateCreated":"2012-11-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"An important note about this film.....","reviewBody":"Probably all of this film is a complete lie, but in all of the reviews both internal and external, the critics have overlooked an amazing thing that seems to have gone unnoticed by most....The actor portraying Hitchcock is wearing flawless silicone gel filled prosthetics over almost every inch of his face and neck...he doesn't look exactly like Hitchcock, but the prosthetics are blended flawlessly and are truly believable. The film itself is completely ridiculous, and anyone who would believe that Tippi Hedren was actually being tortured by birds in take after take is either very simple minded or has no idea as to the way films are actually made...Tippi Hedren was a lukewarm actress who was angry that she could never get work after these films and has convinced herself that it must have been Hitch who was behind her failure, when it was actually the simple fact that she wasn't very good at all."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6854,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-10-20","keywords":"bird,model,blonde,director,actress","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1092227/","name":"Sienna Miller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0429363/","name":"Toby Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001767/","name":"Imelda Staunton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0418982/","name":"Julian Jarrold"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176427/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044704/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0400634/","name":"Gwyneth Hughes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0819488/","name":"Donald Spoto"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Chappie: Directed by Neill Blomkamp. With Sharlto Copley, Dev Patel, Ninja, Yo-Landi Visser. In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force. When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1823672/","name":"Chappie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyNTI4NTIwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjQ4MTI0NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force. When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1823672/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rdoubleoc"},"dateCreated":"2019-04-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"We need a sequel.","reviewBody":"If there was ever a movie that needed a sequel more than another, it's Chappie.\n\nIt's literally probably the best movie I've ever seen, still (and it's 2021 as of this update/writing).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":241460,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-03-06","keywords":"robot,artificial intelligence,future,mind uploading,consciousness","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"New Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi704556569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQ5NjkzNDYyMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjkyODU5MzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQ5NjkzNDYyMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjkyODU5MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Every child comes into the world full of promise, and none more so than Chappie: he is gifted, special, a prodigy. Like any child, Chappie will come under the influence of his surroundings - some good, some bad - and he will rely on his heart and soul to find his way in the world and become his own man. But there's one thing that makes Chappie different from anyone else: he is a robot. The first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself. His life, his story, will change the way the world looks at robots and humans forever."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1663205/","name":"Sharlto Copley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2353862/","name":"Dev Patel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413168/","name":"Hugh Jackman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0088955/","name":"Neill Blomkamp"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0194736/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0479739/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0088955/","name":"Neill Blomkamp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2833612/","name":"Terri Tatchell"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Grown Ups
Duże dzieci
Grown Ups
programme.desc:
Grown Ups: Directed by Dennis Dugan. With Adam Sandler, Kevin James, Chris Rock, David Spade. After their high school basketball coach passes away, five good friends and former teammates reunite for a Fourth of July holiday weekend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1375670/","name":"Grown Ups","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0ODYwNzU5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTI1MTgxMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After their high school basketball coach passes away, five good friends and former teammates reunite for a Fourth of July holiday weekend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1375670/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"djsneakypeaky"},"dateCreated":"2010-07-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good enough","reviewBody":"If you see the cast featured in this movie and think wow, then you'll probably like it.

If you're not a fan of the comedians in this movie chances are you wont like it. I personally tend to like anything Adam Sandler is in and this is no exception. 

Kevin James is his usual goofy self, Chris Rock has done better movies but is still decent in this one. David Spade was average as the whiny singleton. Rob Schneider was okay and Madison Riley as the character of his daughter OMG! Smoking Hot!!! I definitely want to see more of her! I did feel quite old (i'm only 27) when I found out that she was only 20...

All the acting was up to scratch and there were several hilarious moments.

A feel good, funny, family film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":239141,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2010-08-04","keywords":"funeral,reunited friends,ash scattering,pregnant wife,pregnant woman","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grown Ups: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3618113305","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MDE0MDAyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjY1ODMzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MDE0MDAyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjY1ODMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After their high school basketball coach passes away, five good friends and former teammates reunite with their families for a Fourth of July holiday weekend"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001191/","name":"Adam Sandler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000161/","name":"Salma Hayek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0416673/","name":"Kevin James"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059609/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001191/","name":"Adam Sandler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937748/","name":"Fred Wolf"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
T2 Trainspotting: Directed by Danny Boyle. With Ewan McGregor, Logan Gillies, Ben Skelton, Aiden Haggarty. After 20 years abroad, Mark Renton returns to Scotland and reunites with his old friends Sick Boy, Spud, and Begbie." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2763304/","name":"T2 Trainspotting","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI0MTE1ODkzMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQ1MTg5MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"After 20 years abroad, Mark Renton returns to Scotland and reunites with his old friends Sick Boy, Spud, and Begbie.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2763304/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dominic-brock"},"dateCreated":"2017-01-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Choose Trainspotting (And my God, what a choice!)","reviewBody":"It's not often I go to the cinema to watch a day-one screening, but my love of Irvine Welsh and the previous Trainspotting film meant I just could not resist.

This film is a wonderful show of friendship and Begbie's psycho temper which encapsulates left over stories from the first book and large portions of 'Porno' the following book.

I'm pleased to announce that all characters still have that beautiful chemistry featured in the original and work to provide scenes of pure comedy genius and others of emotion and absolute anger. The film really lives and breathes nostalgia of its predecessor, as well as showing how, even if we all change on the outside, we are still the same on the insides. We all make the same choices in life over and over.

My only complaint with this film is that it didn't feel as slick as the first film. This is probably because of the vast improvements in cinematography which you'd expect considering there's an over 20 year age gap. Transitional shots mean you're waiting that little bit longer, but you are probably looking at some of the best views Scotland has to offer in that time.

To sum up, I'd have to say this film is essential viewing for anybody who's seen the first film or read the books. There are so many references which you'll pick up on, leaving you with a wry and joyous smile throughout. For anyone else, you need to watch the original film first (and understand Scottish for anyone reading not in the UK), but I assure you that this film will not disappoint. It's textbook Danny Boyle packed full of nostalgia","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":119581,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-01-27","keywords":"old friends reunited,sequel,drugs,homecoming,prostitute","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Legacy Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3395794457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmMwZGRlZjItZjI1Yi00NDc1LWJjOTMtZTRiZTdlZWI4YmZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmMwZGRlZjItZjI1Yi00NDc1LWJjOTMtZTRiZTdlZWI4YmZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"First there was an opportunity......then there was a betrayal.
 
Twenty years have gone by. Much has changed but just as much remains the same. Mark Renton returns to the only place he can ever call home. They are waiting for him: Spud, Sick Boy, and Begbie."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000191/","name":"Ewan McGregor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001971/","name":"Ewen Bremner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001538/","name":"Jonny Lee Miller"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000965/","name":"Danny Boyle"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0656022/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103974/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0333799/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388076/","name":"John Hodge"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0920543/","name":"Irvine Welsh"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Fun with Dick and Jane: Directed by Dean Parisot. With Jim Carrey, Téa Leoni, Alec Baldwin, Richard Jenkins. When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0369441/","name":"Fun with Dick and Jane","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTJiMWFiNzgtMDQxZi00NTFiLWE2YjMtNTA5NzY5YzQxZjNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0369441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Smells_Like_Cheese"},"dateCreated":"2006-01-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"I had fun with Dick and Jane","reviewBody":"Well, was this the best Jim Carrey comedy? Not really, but it is one of his better late one's. I think because I have had the week from heck, I just needed a good laugh, thanks to Jim. :) Anywho, Dick and Jane are two average Americans who follow by the rules and manage a reasonable budget. When the company that Dick owns goes broke, he is fired, he and Jane are now in trouble when Dick cannot find a job fast enough. Piece by piece they are loosing or having to sell their stuff, when Dick receives an eviction notice, he and Jane have had it and will no longer play by the rules to live their lives once again. With a cast who seemed to enjoy making the film, I think this was over all a funny movie to watch and would recommend it.\n\n7/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":141335,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2006-02-08","keywords":"head shop,character names in title,forenames in title,ceo,suburb","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Fun with Dick and Jane","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3769106713","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE1ZDUwODktZmJkZS00Y2Y5LWJkZTItOWE5MGEwMDVmMTdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE1ZDUwODktZmJkZS00Y2Y5LWJkZTItOWE5MGEwMDVmMTdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000120/","name":"Jim Carrey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000495/","name":"Téa Leoni"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000285/","name":"Alec Baldwin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0661751/","name":"Dean Parisot"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0169347/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0031976/","name":"Judd Apatow"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0831557/","name":"Nicholas Stoller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0301416/","name":"Gerald Gaiser"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: S.W.A.T.: Under Siege
S.W.A.T. Oblężenie
S.W.A.T.: Under Siege
programme.desc:
S.W.A.T.: Under Siege: Directed by Tony Giglio. With Sam Jaeger, Adrianne Palicki, Michael Jai White, Kyra Zagorsky. A SWAT compound comes under fire from an international terrorist who relentlessly and violently pursues a mystery man who was apprehended by Seattle SWAT after a raid went horribly wrong." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6014472/","name":"S.W.A.T.: Under Siege","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTFjMjZkNjEtZmY4OC00YTk1LWFkYzQtY2RiNjQxNDA1ZWQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDA4OTExNDU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A SWAT compound comes under fire from an international terrorist who relentlessly and violently pursues a mystery man who was apprehended by Seattle SWAT after a raid went horribly wrong.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6014472/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ginocox-206-336968"},"dateCreated":"2017-08-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good fight sequences, but weak script","reviewBody":""S.W.A.T.: Under Siege" should delete its writer's credit and replace it with a line crediting everybody who has written an action film in the past. The plot draws heavily from "Assault on Precinct 13" and "Safe House," with a lot of familiar tropes seen in dozens of genre films. What few mild surprises the plot offers generally happen off-screen, although it is not easy to predict which characters will die, who will kill whom and the order of their demises. The biggest surprise seems borrowed from "Showdown in Little Tokyo" and is surprising only because the film hadn't yet developed the characters – although, to their credit, it is a great improvement on the SILT scene. The bad guys who are really good and the good guys who are really bad could have simply worn T- shirts identifying themselves. The dialogue alternates between pretentious, execrable, familiar and unnecessary. Production values are generally adequate, although marred by over-reliance on distracting jiggly-cam shots. 

However, the fight scenes are capably executed. Michael Jai White is highly proficient and other cast members demonstrate considerable skill as well, including Marsden, Zagorsky, Jaeger and Palicki. The fight choreography is competent, although uninspired. The special effects incorporated into the numerous gun battles are handled well. 

Advocates of diversity in films should be encouraged by the ethnically diverse cast. However, skeptics will note that most of the Asian, Hispanic and black performers are in background roles and underutilized. The director seems to have attempted to give a couple of them more screen time with prolonged noble demises, but the shots seem more distracting than empowering. White delivers his dialogue with a heavy accent and another character is given an urban 'tude, but as in many films with large casts, the diversity seems more a result of casting decisions than screen writing choices.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3168,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2017-08-01","keywords":"sequel,2010s,washington state,washington,pacific northwest","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"S.W.A.T.: Under Siege","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3058612249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTNmNjNhODYtOGUzMC00MDY5LTk2ZWUtOGIyMTI2MWNhYmVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTNmNjNhODYtOGUzMC00MDY5LTk2ZWUtOGIyMTI2MWNhYmVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0415382/","name":"Sam Jaeger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1597316/","name":"Adrianne Palicki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0925220/","name":"Michael Jai White"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0317638/","name":"Tony Giglio"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017834/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1396586/","name":"Jonas Barnes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2600276/","name":"Keith Domingue"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

However, skeptics will note that most of the Asian, Hispanic and black performers are in background roles and underutilized. The director seems to have attempted to give a couple of them more screen time with prolonged noble demises, but the shots seem more distracting than empowering. White delivers his dialogue with a heavy accent and another character is given an urban 'tude, but as in many films with large casts, the diversity seems more a result of casting decisions than screen writing choices.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3168,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2017-08-01","keywords":"sequel,2010s,washington state,washington,pacific northwest","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"S.W.A.T.: Under Siege","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3058612249","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTNmNjNhODYtOGUzMC00MDY5LTk2ZWUtOGIyMTI2MWNhYmVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTNmNjNhODYtOGUzMC00MDY5LTk2ZWUtOGIyMTI2MWNhYmVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0415382/","name":"Sam Jaeger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1597316/","name":"Adrianne Palicki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0925220/","name":"Michael Jai White"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0317638/","name":"Tony Giglio"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017834/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1396586/","name":"Jonas Barnes","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2600276/","name":"Keith Domingue"],"duration":"PT1H29M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Tony Giglio

programme.desc:
2012: Directed by Roland Emmerich. With John Cusack, Amanda Peet, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Thandiwe Newton. A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1190080/","name":"2012","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0MjEyODQzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTczMjQ4Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1190080/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"polombob"},"dateCreated":"2009-11-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's the end of the world, not anybody's career","reviewBody":"Anybody going to this movie to learn about the Mayan prophecies for 2012 or for any true science, is going to be sadly disappointed. But, that is not why we go to movies anyway, is it? That is like going to see Godzilla expecting to learn something about giant lizards that vomit radioactive spray. Emmerich has taken a fictitious subject he knew would be controversial and woven some drama into it. People who tend to be slightly paranoid will no doubt be even more so after seeing the world destroyed according to interpretations of prophecy. The people who sell the books promoting the fear make money, just like the movie producers. So what? I didn't see this movie to pick up any information I haven't learned from the History Channel, nor do I believe any more than I did before, that anything bad is going to happen on December 21, 2012. Did I go expecting to be highly entertained by great CGI and action? Yes! And I wasn't disappointed! One thing many reviewers haven't been picking up on while watching this movie is the very slight tongue-in-cheekiness of the subject that Emmerich cleverly wove into the plot. He obviously doesn't believe any of the prophecy any more than most of the rest of us do. You can see it in the actors' performances too: Woody Harrelson, to wit. It is the same as a weatherman who can deliver his forecast each night without laughing because he truly doesn't know with certainty what is going to happen, but he tries to make us believe nonetheless.

See this movie if you love cinema. Enjoy the things about cinema that make it great. Take a small pillow for your butt cheeks because almost 3 hours of sitting in an uncomfortable theater seat will make you wish you had. But fear not. There is so much non-stop action you won't notice the discomfort too much.

The film has obvious flaws, trite clichés, and phony science, but if you are a fan of 50's sci-fi, you will love this movie. And remember, don't take it too seriously folks, just enjoy it. The end of the world isn't going to happen in 2012, there really aren't any giant grasshoppers, ants, or lizards roaming the Earth, and no one's career is going to end because of their role in this movie. It is Hollywood having a good time with a controversial subject. Nothing new there.

Enjoy the show!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":365682,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-11-11","keywords":"apocalypse,earthquake,end of the world,elizabeth i character,juvenile bedwetting","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"2012: Final Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3444113945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk0NDQ4MjE5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgzMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk0NDQ4MjE5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgzMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An academic researcher leads a group of people in a fight to counteract the apocalyptic events that were predicted by the ancient Mayan calendar. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000131/","name":"John Cusack"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0628601/","name":"Thandiwe Newton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0252230/","name":"Chiwetel Ejiofor"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247168/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460057/","name":"Harald Kloser"}],"duration":"PT2H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: White Boy Rick: Directed by Yann Demange. With Matthew McConaughey, Richie Merritt, Bel Powley, Jennifer Jason Leigh. The story of teenager Richard Wershe Jr., who became an undercover informant for the FBI during the 1980s and was ultimately arrested for drug-trafficking and sentenced to life in prison." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4537896/","name":"White Boy Rick","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQ5MzY4NjQ4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzc1NjU4NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of teenager Richard Wershe Jr., who became an undercover informant for the FBI during the 1980s and was ultimately arrested for drug-trafficking and sentenced to life in prison.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4537896/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"stephanie-jones21"},"dateCreated":"2018-09-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pleasantly Surprised..","reviewBody":"White Boy Rick: This is a true story based in the 80's about a 15-year-old, Rick Wershe Jr, who worked as an undercover FBI informant. I hadn't read up on this story, because I wanted to watch the movie not knowing any details. I was pleasantly surprised. This movie was not what I was expecting. I went in thinking it would be a Pablo Escobar kinda movie, but it was not. It's about a teenager trying to figure out how to survive living in a low income part of Detroit. It was heart wrenching, and even had some very funny parts. It also had some parts that made you shake your head and say, "what is he thinking?" In my opinion, it's definitely worth the watch. Also, I was completely blown away by Richie Merritt's performance. Especially since this was the first time he's acted, ever.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34154,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-14","keywords":"detroit michigan,drug trafficking,three word title,color in title,gender in title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2342173465","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2YwNjc2Y2EtMzFjNC00ODg0LTg3ZjItNGE0YjFiZmNmOTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2YwNjc2Y2EtMzFjNC00ODg0LTg3ZjItNGE0YjFiZmNmOTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in 1980s Detroit at the height of the crack epidemic and the War on Drugs, 'White Boy Rick' is based on the true story of a blue-collar father and his teenage son, Rick Wershe Jr., who became an undercover police informant and later a drug dealer.."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000190/","name":"Matthew McConaughey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8822933/","name":"Richie Merritt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2525790/","name":"Bel Powley"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1312919/","name":"Yann Demange"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0368761/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0062935/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0329296/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0918907/","name":"Andy Weiss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3039088/","name":"Logan Miller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2387990/","name":"Noah Miller"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
programme.desc:
Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines: Directed by Jonathan Mostow. With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nick Stahl, Claire Danes, Kristanna Loken. A machine from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a man and a woman from an advanced robotic assassin to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0181852/","name":"Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk5NzM1ODgyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzA5MjAzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A machine from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a man and a woman from an advanced robotic assassin to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0181852/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"RoxanneAndorfer"},"dateCreated":"2003-07-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"The more I think about this movie, the more it grows on me.","reviewBody":"I didn't go to see this movie with very high expectations, because it has gotten such varied and sometimes disparaging reviews this forum. However, since I am an aspiring screenwriter and true cinema fan rather than simply a moviegoer, I decided to give this movie the benefit of the doubt. At the very least, I could end up writing a scathing attack on it.

Instead, I have found that I enjoyed the movie as I watched it, saw some flaws, but have discovered that the more I think about it, the more I want to give it a higher rating than I initially did (7). The film's two major dramatic flaws, in my opinion, are: (1) An over-the-top chase scene that comes way too early in the script without sufficient build-up in suspense leading up to it; (2) A little too much campy humor recycled from the first two Terminator movies.

The good outweighs the bad by a large margin. (1) The screenplay has some intriguing plot subtleties that grow on me after awhile, the most notable of which is the actual nature of the safe place. It could be the way it is for several possible reasons, some strategically favoring SkyNet, some the humans. Any of them could be spun into a major plot element for a sequel. The rest you'll just have to find yourself. (2) The character development of both John Connor and Kate Brewster is elegant, believable and moving, and also opens possibilities for future character development. (3) The plot is an interesting variation of the "Reluctant Hero" theme, which is a classic in literature and drama and always will be. John Connor is a hero who is almost an anti-hero. True, they could have sharpened his ambivalence a little (sacrificing some chase footage for it would have been an excellent trade, in my opinion). (4) The Terminatrix is a very good villain: She's young, she's sexy, and she's chillingly soulless. She is actually too smoothly sexy and physically perfect, but that makes sense when you consider that she has been created and programmed by other machines who, lacking the real-world experience of humans, can only base her appearance and humanoid behavior on their knowledge of human stereotypes.

That last leads me to some thoughts about Arnie's character. He is clearly getting a little too old for a reprise of his customary youthful, physically perfect role in any sequel. If he is brought back in a sequel - and I hope he is - a good, imaginative screenwriter could really work with his advancing age and loss of physical perfection. Since he is programmed by humans with real human experience, he could be brought back as a deceptively older and less physically powerful character, but more psychologically sophisticated (more like a true human with a soul), and his deceptive physical appearance combined with his greater psychological sophistication could be his aces in the hole when his strength and nonhuman cyborg qualities are insufficient. In other words, he could be shaped into an amazing supporting hero in any sequel. Maybe I could write his role!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":388060,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2003-08-27","keywords":"time travel,skynet,humanoid cyborg,exploding truck,nuclear launch","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2056585497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk1OGM3YTctZDhmYy00Y2IwLWExMDgtMDA2Mzg4MWM0YWFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk1OGM3YTctZDhmYy00Y2IwLWExMDgtMDA2Mzg4MWM0YWFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000216/","name":"Arnold Schwarzenegger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001763/","name":"Nick Stahl"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0518085/","name":"Kristanna Loken"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0609236/","name":"Jonathan Mostow"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066021/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010183/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0109128/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104335/","name":"John Brancato"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0274905/","name":"Michael Ferris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0093328/","name":"Tedi Sarafian"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0181852, Title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines, --- Description: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines: Directed by Jonathan Mostow. With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nick Stahl, Claire Danes, Kristanna Loken. A machine from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a man and a woman from an advanced robotic assassin to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0181852/","name":"Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk5NzM1ODgyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzA5MjAzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A machine from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a man and a woman from an advanced robotic assassin to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0181852/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"RoxanneAndorfer","dateCreated":"2003-07-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"The more I think about this movie, the more it grows on me.","reviewBody":"I didn't go to see this movie with very high expectations, because it has gotten such varied and sometimes disparaging reviews this forum. However, since I am an aspiring screenwriter and true cinema fan rather than simply a moviegoer, I decided to give this movie the benefit of the doubt. At the very least, I could end up writing a scathing attack on it.

Instead, I have found that I enjoyed the movie as I watched it, saw some flaws, but have discovered that the more I think about it, the more I want to give it a higher rating than I initially did (7). The film's two major dramatic flaws, in my opinion, are: (1) An over-the-top chase scene that comes way too early in the script without sufficient build-up in suspense leading up to it; (2) A little too much campy humor recycled from the first two Terminator movies.

The good outweighs the bad by a large margin. (1) The screenplay has some intriguing plot subtleties that grow on me after awhile, the most notable of which is the actual nature of the safe place. It could be the way it is for several possible reasons, some strategically favoring SkyNet, some the humans. Any of them could be spun into a major plot element for a sequel. The rest you'll just have to find yourself. (2) The character development of both John Connor and Kate Brewster is elegant, believable and moving, and also opens possibilities for future character development. (3) The plot is an interesting variation of the "Reluctant Hero" theme, which is a classic in literature and drama and always will be. John Connor is a hero who is almost an anti-hero. True, they could have sharpened his ambivalence a little (sacrificing some chase footage for it would have been an excellent trade, in my opinion). (4) The Terminatrix is a very good villain: She's young, she's sexy, and she's chillingly soulless. She is actually too smoothly sexy and physically perfect, but that makes sense when you consider that she has been created and programmed by other machines who, lacking the real-world experience of humans, can only base her appearance and humanoid behavior on their knowledge of human stereotypes.

That last leads me to some thoughts about Arnie's character. He is clearly getting a little too old for a reprise of his customary youthful, physically perfect role in any sequel. If he is brought back in a sequel - and I hope he is - a good, imaginative screenwriter could really work with his advancing age and loss of physical perfection. Since he is programmed by humans with real human experience, he could be brought back as a deceptively older and less physically powerful character, but more psychologically sophisticated (more like a true human with a soul), and his deceptive physical appearance combined with his greater psychological sophistication could be his aces in the hole when his strength and nonhuman cyborg qualities are insufficient. In other words, he could be shaped into an amazing supporting hero in any sequel. Maybe I could write his role!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":388060,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2003-08-27","keywords":"time travel,skynet,humanoid cyborg,exploding truck,nuclear launch","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2056585497","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk1OGM3YTctZDhmYy00Y2IwLWExMDgtMDA2Mzg4MWM0YWFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk1OGM3YTctZDhmYy00Y2IwLWExMDgtMDA2Mzg4MWM0YWFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000216/","name":"Arnold Schwarzenegger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001763/","name":"Nick Stahl","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0518085/","name":"Kristanna Loken"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0609236/","name":"Jonathan Mostow"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066021/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010183/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0109128/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104335/","name":"John Brancato","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0274905/","name":"Michael Ferris","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0093328/","name":"Tedi Sarafian"],"duration":"PT1H49M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Jonathan Mostow

programme.title: White House Down
Świat w płomieniach
White House Down
programme.desc: White House Down: Directed by Roland Emmerich. With Channing Tatum, Jamie Foxx, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Jason Clarke. While on a tour of the White House with his young daughter, a Capitol policeman springs into action to save his child and protect the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2334879/","name":"White House Down","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmI5ZGIxOGMtMjcwMS00Yzk3LWE0YWUtMzc5YTFhNGQ4OWZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"While on a tour of the White House with his young daughter, a Capitol policeman springs into action to save his child and protect the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2334879/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"preppy-3"},"dateCreated":"2013-07-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Way too stupid and overlong","reviewBody":"A bunch of terrorists attack and (way too easily) occupy the White House. Cale (Channing Tatum) is there with his 11 year old daughter Emily (Joey King). Through circumstances Cale saves President Sawyer (Jamie Foxx) from being killed and they try to figure a way to beat the terrorists and save the White House.\n\nThis starts out badly. The first half hour deals with character development. Nothing wrong with that--but it's so DULL! Then the action starts up and it picks up. There's plenty of violence--LOTS of shootings but no blood (hence the PG-13 rating). Still it isn't that good. The action is strong and violent but not enough to carry the movie. Also it's far too long and gets stupider as it goes along. Seriously--by the end I was getting insulted as how moronic the film was getting. Also Emily (an 11 year old) is slapped around, threatened and (more than once) has a gun held to her head! That's going too far. Even worse is Tatum's acting. He was blank-faced throughout. On the plus side the special effects were great, Foxx was good as the president, and Maggie Gyllenhaal and James Woods were great in supporting roles. So it was loud and violent but too long and too stupid.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":214451,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2013-06-28","keywords":"white house,automatic weapon,attempted coup d'etat,stabbed with a pen,beaten to death","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1969202713","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0MzE3NjM4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTM3NzAzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0MzE3NjM4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTM3NzAzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"While on a tour of the White House with his young daughter, a Capitol policeman springs into action to save his child and protect the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1475594/","name":"Channing Tatum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004937/","name":"Jamie Foxx"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350454/","name":"Maggie Gyllenhaal"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0321082/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050111/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0888743/","name":"James Vanderbilt"}],"duration":"PT2H11M"}</script><metacontent="

Seventeen-year-old Mirek, the son of a local organist, falls in love with her, and his grandfather, suffering from dementia, sees the girl as a lover from her youth. Mirek takes advantage of his grandfather's illness to get closer to Agata. programme.title: Moby Doc
Moby Doc
programme.desc: Moby Doc: Directed by Rob Gordon Bralver. With Moby, David Lynch, Julie Mintz, Gary Baseman. A surrealist biographical documentary about trailblazing electronic musician and animal rights activist Moby." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5452210/","name":"Moby Doc","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzViMmFlMjItODgxMy00NTg2LWIyZjAtODQwM2VjNmI5MmIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTM5NzYzNTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A surrealist biographical documentary about trailblazing electronic musician and animal rights activist Moby.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5452210/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"WePerished"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Somehow makes trauma feel like vanity","reviewBody":"As a big Moby fan back in the day I was really excited to see it. But what a bizarre documentary. Very contrived interview set up with fake conversations with fake psychiatrists and with people on the phone. Stylistically it jumps around and is very inconsistent. The story leaps around and doesn't link together and huge periods of his life are just left out. There's very odd b-roll choices and over-use of space and rockets. The humour feels awkward and makes the deeper stuff seem like it wasn't to be taken serious.\n\nBut the most disappointing thing was how insincere it comes across. For a story with so much trauma, sadness, suicide etc it comes across more as vanity than vulnerability. I appreciate bold creative choices, but boy did they make the wrong ones here. It just completely undermined the themes of the film. It's a mess that makes Moby less relatable. IMDb data; ttnr: 5452210, Title: Moby Doc, --- Description: Moby Doc: Directed by Rob Gordon Bralver. With Moby, David Lynch, Julie Mintz, Gary Baseman. A surrealist biographical documentary about trailblazing electronic musician and animal rights activist Moby." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5452210/","name":"Moby Doc","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzViMmFlMjItODgxMy00NTg2LWIyZjAtODQwM2VjNmI5MmIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTM5NzYzNTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A surrealist biographical documentary about trailblazing electronic musician and animal rights activist Moby.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5452210/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"WePerished","dateCreated":"2021-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Somehow makes trauma feel like vanity","reviewBody":"As a big Moby fan back in the day I was really excited to see it. But what a bizarre documentary. Very contrived interview set up with fake conversations with fake psychiatrists and with people on the phone. Stylistically it jumps around and is very inconsistent. The story leaps around and doesn't link together and huge periods of his life are just left out. There's very odd b-roll choices and over-use of space and rockets. The humour feels awkward and makes the deeper stuff seem like it wasn't to be taken serious.\n\nBut the most disappointing thing was how insincere it comes across. For a story with so much trauma, sadness, suicide etc it comes across more as vanity than vulnerability. I appreciate bold creative choices, but boy did they make the wrong ones here. It just completely undermined the themes of the film. It's a mess that makes Moby less relatable. This is exactly how NOT to make a documentary about this subject matter.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":715,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"genre":["Documentary","Biography","Music"],"datePublished":"2021-05-28","keywords":"musician,fame,animal,vegan,grim reaper","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Moby Doc","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3750084633","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjY3NTAxZjUtNjljZi00N2YzLTljZjUtMTExOGZiNDhlZjVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjY3NTAxZjUtNjljZi00N2YzLTljZjUtMTExOGZiNDhlZjVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005240/","name":"Moby","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000186/","name":"David Lynch","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0591777/","name":"Julie Mintz"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3964003/","name":"Rob Gordon Bralver"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0744176/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3964003/","name":"Rob Gordon Bralver","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005240/","name":"Moby"],"duration":"PT1H32M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Rob Gordon Bralver
